sentences.sentence: So that if a man happens to love someone, either male of female, he would be more eager "to win the rewards of valor."
sentences.translation: 所以只要一名男性刚好喜欢某人，无论是男是女，他将势必会渴望，赢得英勇的奖赏。

sentences.sentence: Part of that responsibility is making sure that we honor our commitments to those who have served our country with such valor.
sentences.translation: 我的部分责任是确保那些为国家英勇服役的军人获得应得的荣誉。

sentences.sentence: Nobody starts a software project planning to fail, but discretion truly is the better part of valor if things start coming apart.
sentences.translation: 没有人在软件项目开始时就计划失败，但是谨慎确实比勇猛要重要一些。
